events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received.
Hello! I'm very sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the mistake?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the item I received which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund and provide you with a prepaid return label for the wrong item.
Thank you for your prompt help! I appreciate receiving the refund and the return label.
We have processed your refund and sent the return shipping label to your email. Please let us know if you have any further questions.
We are following up to ensure the refund process went smoothly and to check if you need any further assistance.
Since we have not received further questions, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support.
Please take a moment to complete a brief survey about your experience with our support team.
